text: Denise Nickerson (April 1, 1957 - July 10, 2019) was an American former actress, singer, and accountant. She played Violet in Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory in 1971. She played Allison on season 2 of The Electric Company in 1972â€“1973. She retired from acting in 1993. Nickerson died on July 10, 2019 from a seizure caused by pneumonia at a hospital in Aurora, Colorado at the age of 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from New York City Category:Singers from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from seizure Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Accountants Category:1957 births Category:2019 deaths
title: Denise Nickerson
